english.description: Information about donating to the bot. What do you get? How to donate?

execution.text:
Thank you very much for considering donating!

_How to donate?_
You can donate through PayBox, PayPal and Patreon
1. https://payboxapp.page.link/VNQQ1AAknBKoneF79
2. https://www.patreon.com/wailcommunitybot
3. https://www.buymeacoffee.com/leobot
4. https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/whatsappbotisrael

When donating, please leave a note stating your phone number so that I can contact you and give you certain "privileges"

_Questions_
For questions use the command {prefix}developer

_What do you get? (Only for donations above 1 USD or 3 NIS)_
1. Smaller cooldown between commands
2. Allow the bot to keep running for the whole community!
3. Those who donate above 5USD will get to give access to a group of their choice to Premium features.
*(The privileges of your donation stay for a month from the moment they are applied unless you donate more than the minimum, which may give you more time)*

_Why donate?_
You donations keep the bot running.
At this moment, the bot is not at a good financial point.
Your donations will help cover:
1. The server the bot is running on.
2. Upgrading the hardware the bot is running on in order to deal with growing needs of the bot.
3. The phone number of the bot
4. I put in over 200 hours of my time working on this bot making it the best I can.

crimes.name: shoplifting
crimes.failed: You tried to steal something but the shop was closed!
crimes.success: You managed to steal {amount} {coin}. Money Heist!
crimes.death: You stole an unknown drink and drank it. It turned out to be poison and you died. RIP

crimes.name: vandalism
crimes.failed: You tried to write something on a wall, but ran out of spray. LOL
crimes.success: You wrote a support message for the bot on the wall. The developers sent you {amount} {coin}. Nice!

crimes.name: drug distribution
crimes.failed: You didn't find any clients... Maybe try a different industry?
crimes.success: You distributed a lot of drugs and earned {amount} {coin}, are you the next Escobar?
crimes.death: Police caught you and killed you immediately ğŸ˜¥ No more drugs!

crimes.name: tax evasion
crimes.failed: You accidentally sent correct papers and earned nothing. Loser!
crimes.success: You saved {amount} {coin} on avoiding taxes! You'd better not tell anyone...

crimes.name: arson
crimes.failed: Turns out that's the fire station, it didn't go up in flames.
crimes.success: You set a building on fire and on your way out you found {amount} {coin}
crimes.death: You tried to set the police station on fire! They didn't appreciate it and kinda sorta.. shot you..

crimes.name: murder
crimes.failed: You tried to murder a random stranger, but he got away! You can't even murder properly.
crimes.success: You murdered a random stranger in a dark alley. There was {amount} {coin} in his wallet! Was it worth it?
crimes.death: You were holding the gun upside down and killed yourself! Imagine being this stupid!

crimes.name: cyber bullying
crimes.failed: You tried to bully a kid, but quickly got banned by mods. LOL, seeya idiot.
crimes.success: You bullied a kid and he sent you {amount} {coin} to stop! I hope that kid grows up richer than you.
crimes.death: You laughed at a kid so much, you choked to death. Who is laughing now? Imagine being a bully.

crimes.name: fraud
crimes.failed: Turns out that old lady you tried to scam, was also a scammer!
crimes.success: You lied to an old lady over the phone and got {amount} {coin}
crimes.death: Lady you tried to fool had a shotgun and shot you! That's just sad.

crimes.name: identity theft
crimes.failed: Somebody noticed your strange behaviour and reported you.
crimes.success: You stole a hooker's identity, started dancing and got {amount} {coin}
crimes.death: You stole the identity of Chuck Norris... Unfortunately, he noticed it and MURDERED you in cold blood!
